column5: I like using the little guy at times, but the second basically says it all.
Nice shot of the kids Vinni, but why all the attacks against the mods lately? I think that much of the success of OFC is because of its modering practices.
yeah, same.  the other will go over a few heads rather quick...
I always thought that first picture was Buster 25 years ago !!
Heres one for the double words posts and winternet
Now go and talk quietly amongst yourselves

No attack Dan  !! We love all of you guys. Its Group Dynamics thats all.People in a crowd tend to lose individuality and begin to follow 'percieved leaders' under certain circumstances.Follow the leader syndrome. Like i said before, i think all of you guys are doing great.Keep doing it
Not my kids,a few pics I found and I like using them for what the  topic title states, thats all, enjoy, use them if you wish

24 hours later and I finally get it. DOH!! My thinking was that the child with the "Shhhhh" shot was saying that the mods should keep quiet. I get it now. Apologies to Vinni and especially to fellow mod ChrisK.
Use it as you wish Dan
Awesome. Can you explain it to me then?

First you take someone out into the woods with a burlap sack. Then you tell them to wait their and you will move down stream about 200 yards with a flashlight. They then will splash thru the water flapping their arms to chase the snipe towards you.... o wait never mind thats snipe hunting.    Art
